Name: Boat Rage
About the game: Boat races are arranged, you are the only remaining participant who got into an awkward situation, mines began to emerge from the water, which you need to go around and arrive at the finish line in time, because mines are not an excuse! Boat Rage - 3d racing game on boats, you drive a boat, dodging mines, crossing checkpoints in time, get to the finish line in time! Game Features: - 3d - Visual Style - Dynamic music - Difficulty
